title: ICAI ने Digital Audits को मजबूत करने के लिए 11 Information Systems Audit Standards (ISAS) जारी किए!
content:
# ICAI ने Digital Audits को मजबूत करने के लिए 11 Information Systems Audit Standards (ISAS) जारी किए!

Ek important update hai! The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne **February 26, 2026,** ko digital audits ko strengthen karne ke liye 11 Information Systems Audit Standards (ISAS) ka rollout announce kiya hai. Yeh initiative India ke rapidly growing digital ecosystem mein audit processes ko enhance karne aur related risks ko address karne ke liye design kiya gaya hai.

**Main Points:**

*   **Kya Hai?** ICAI ne 11 Information Systems Audit Standards (ISAS) introduce kiye hain.
*   **Kyun?** In standards ka aim digital audits ko majboot karna, audit processes ko behtar banana, aur technology-driven economy mein hone wale risks ko effectively handle karna hai.
*   **Auditors ke Liye:** Yeh comprehensive framework auditors ko system controls, data security, aur technology-driven financial reporting ko assess karne ke liye guidance provide karega.
*   **Commitment:** Yeh move global best practices ko adopt karne aur future ke technological challenges ke liye auditors ko prepare karne ki ICAI ki commitment ko reflect karta hai.
*   **Mandatory Status:** Digital Accounting and Assurance Board (DAAB) ke under yeh standards aate hain, aur ICAI Council in standards ko appropriate time par mandatory banane ka decision legi.

Yeh standards Chartered Accountants ko IT-driven environments mein audit karne ke liye zaroori tools aur framework denge, jisse financial reporting ki reliability aur integrity badhegi.
